root.p: The frowning of the he-goat cannot stop it from being priced at the market.
When the music stops, a deaf person continues to dance.
A slave boy is blamed no matter what he does: If he does not wash his hands, he is accused of being dirty. If he washes his hands, he is accused of wasting water.
You cannot bury smoke in the ground
The lizard says that he knows the condition of his underbelly. This is the reason he has it pressed against the ground.
Let the man who believes he can do everything dig a grave and bury himself
A person who is being carried to the market does not realize that the way is long.
